programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Beast Lands
programme.desc: Intialainen maalaiskyla joutuu ihmisen ja ihmissyojan valisen konfliktin etulinjalle ja tiikerien hyokkaykset lisaantyvat. Dave Salmoni lahtee selvittamaan niiden syyta.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Mita jos sukupuuttoon kuolleita lajeja onkin edelleen olemassa? Villielaimiin erikoistunut biologi Forrest Galante kiertaa maapalloa etsimassa lajeja, jotka muu maailma on jo unohtanut. Tyovalineinaan hanella on huipputeknologiaa seka kaikkiin elaimiin kohdistuva syva tiedonjano. Etsinnat vievat Forrestin kaukaisiin ja joskus vaarallisiinkin paikkoihin. (Extinct Or Alive, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin. Riistanvalvojat etsivat alligaattoria, joka on purrut miesta ja taman 13-vuotiasta poikaa. Lansi-Teksasista loytynyt hylatty auto antaa aihetta uskoa, etta teinitytto on kadonnut.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: The Browns begin an ambitious barn build, the key to Billys grand vision. Plus, Noah returns, reuniting the entire wolfpack for the first time since Alaska.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 11/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 5/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 6/12. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet , tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 4. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii joella.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Puumajarakentamisen nero Alain Laurens liittyy Peten matkaan Ranskassa. Han esittelee upeita rakennuksiaan, jotka antavat puumajoille aivan uuden merkityksen!

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Suru-uutiset saavat Mariahin tolaltaan. Yhden koiran sijaan neljalla on mahdollisuus paasta omaan kotiin.

programme.title: Kaikki kissoista
programme.desc: Esittelyssa kissarodut: tonkineesi, nebelung, serengeti, korat, ragamuffin ja toyger. Mukana myos pitkalle pyrkivia seikkailevia porropaita.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson tiimeineen rakentaa toinen toistaan uskomattomampia puumajoja ihmisille, jotka haluavat kosketuksiin luonnon kanssa.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Tiimi suuntaa Fairbanksin kaupungin ulkopuolelle syvalle Alaskan sisamaahan tutkimaan havaintoja Pohjoisen jattilaiseksi kutsutusta karhumaisesta otuksesta.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Bengalinkissa hairitsee ystavysten Shannan ja Lorin rauhaa ja ilkea uroskissa aiheuttaa huolta tulevalle emolle. Pystyyko Jackson auttamaan kissaongelmissa?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 12/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Brittilainen Marine Pen Farthing johtaa Afganistanin ainoaa virallista elaintenpelastusorganisaatiota. Sotilaan pelastamat kuusi koiraa taytyy saattaa taman luokse Teksasiin.

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymiseen keskittynyt terapeutti Jacqueline Wilson kay suur-Los Angelesin alueen pikkukoirien luona yrittamassa korjata niiden pahoja tapoja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff yrittaa pelastaa kohtauksen saaneen parta-agaman. Elainlaakari Amyn taidot joutuvat koetukselle, kun kissan rutiinisteriloinnissa tapahtuu komplikaatioita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Rakastetulla bassetilla on sairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasissa kaikki on suurempaa, mukaan lukien riistanvalvojien tyo. He suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja ja valvovat sen 27 miljoonaa asukasta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Matkalla Etela-Afrikan Mpumalagaan etsitaan Kapin myyrarottaa. Otuksella on valtavat partakoneenteravat hampaat ja se tunnetaan nimella maanalainen kuningas.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Alabaman Appalakeille veikean vakoilumajan, jonka varustuksiin kuuluu puhekojeita, piilokaytavia, salahuoneita ja paljon muuta!

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Villalobosissa valmistaudutaan Isaac-myrskyyn. Mariah ja kaksoset selvittavat vuosien takaista mysteeria.

programme.title: Kaikki kissoista
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa tutustutaan harvinaisiin kissarotuihin: don sfinx, highlander, serengeti, minskin, kuriilien bobtail ja sokoke.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 12/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff yrittaa pelastaa kohtauksen saaneen parta-agaman. Elainlaakari Amyn taidot joutuvat koetukselle, kun kissan rutiinisteriloinnissa tapahtuu komplikaatioita.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson kumppaneineen rakentaa piilopirtteja puuhun niille, jotka tahtovat kosketuksiin luonnon ja sisaisen lapsensa kanssa.

programme.title: Painajaiseni: Joe Exotic
programme.desc: Joe Exotic antaa yhden viimeisimmista pidatystaan edeltavista haastatteluista. Entinen tyontekija paljastaa totuuden G.W.Zoo -elaintarhasta, jonka isoja kissa pelastetaan.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistilalla syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasissa kaikki on suurempaa, mukaan lukien riistanvalvojien tyo. He suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja ja valvovat sen 27 miljoonaa asukasta.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan pizzaa rakastava mopsi, koira, joka tuhoaa taloa ja takapihaa seka myohemmin talleilta karkaava hevonen, joka vapauttaa myos muut hevoset.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrestin uskaliaimpiin ja jannittavimpiin tutkimusretkiin kuuluu matka Galapagos-saarille, missa han etsii tarunhohtoista Fernandina-kilpikonnaa.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta nimeltaan Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Liikkeen ideana on rakentaa toinen toistaan upeampia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 2. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof
programme.desc: Holly Willoughby and Lee Mack host as Dutch extreme athlete Wim Hof trains eight celebrities to endure a series of challenges in sub-zero temperatures.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green explores an ancient trail along the stunning Jurassic Coast in Dorset, and comes face-to-skull with a giant Pliosaur, also known as a Sea-Rex

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Special compilation episode following seven people who live in one of the worlds loneliest places. They must overcome snow storms, frozen terrain and limited resources to survive.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The warm season provides for Alaskans.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben builds hammocks, goes freediving and experiences rough seas when he meets British expat Rick and his girlfriend Jasna, who live a nomadic life on their yacht in the islands of French Polynesia.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Michael Mosley meets a 73-year-old jazz musician in Chicago and discovers why playing music can prevent the hearing loss. He also reveals why aerobic exercise can help prevent the onset of glaucoma.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy citys annual procession.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve finds out who is boss as he faces a real life King Kong. He gets up close to Africas largest snake and stakes out a crocodile nest to try and catch a sneaky thief red-handed.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Dorset to live for a week with Chris, a former paratrooper who has spent the last five years walking Britains coastline, finding love and raising thousands for charity.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets Vanessa Forero deep in the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, an isolated mountain range in the north of Columbia.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. In its path are the homes of seven thousand residents and the emergency services rush to evacuate. Within twenty-four hours, volcano expert Chris Horsley is on the scene.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg visits Ribenas Gloucestershire factory, where 90% of Britains blackcurrants are turned into soft drinks. He is amazed to find out that the aroma of the blackcurrants is captured separately and later added back into the drink.

programme.title: Primates
programme.desc: Today, more than half of the worlds primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy citys annual procession.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europes rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory to explore the surprising process of turning potato starch into 500 million packs of Quavers cheese curls every year.

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben journeys from Stroma, inhabited 1,000 years ago, to Swona, its first inhabitants being the Vikings and then to the towering prehistoric cliffs of St Kilda, the most remote of Scotlands islands.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: TV presenter Alex Brooker and comedian Ellie Taylor are thrown together for an adventure across Java where erupting volcanoes pose as big a threat as the roads.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to the forests of the North Cascade Mountains in Washington, USA, to live with British-born Lynx Vilden, who employs some tricks of the Stone Age to survive in the Wilderness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman get exclusive access to some of the largest factories in the world to reveal the secrets behind the epic-scale production of our favourite products. 4/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Personal stories of those caught up in sometimes deadly natural catastrophes, accompanied by camera footage showing meteorological phenomena, including hurricanes, earthquakes, monsoons and more.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyotos geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his trusty 1913 Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide, Michael Portillo ventures east to the independent state of Ukraine, a land that was once part of the Russian empire. He starts his journey in the capital, Kiev, where he encounters mummified monks and two of the strongest women in the world. After a stop-off in the city of Lviv, he boards the night express to Odessa, where he finds a vibrant, cosmopolitan city, and rounds off this leg of his journey by visiting the opera.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: TV presenter Alex Brooker and comedian Ellie Taylor are thrown together for an adventure across Java where erupting volcanoes pose as big a threat as the roads.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: A special episode featuring some of the best moments from the series. Steve races a cheetah, rescues a king cobra and shares some of those rare times when things go wrong. 11/11

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets Vanessa Forero deep in the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, an isolated mountain range in the north of Columbia.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europes rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a cherry Bakewell factory in Stoke on Trent that produces 250,000 tarts every day, and meets the team of 12 employed to precisely place the cherries on top by hand. Cherry Healey learns the tricks of avoiding a soggy pastry bottom when baking at home, and visits a factory where almonds are roasted and milled to make butter. Historian Ruth Goodman discovers the origins of frangipane as a perfume in 17th-century Paris, and discovers how the modern cherry Bakewell recipe was arrived at by accident.

programme.title: Wild France
programme.desc: The Atlantic winds blow on a country blessed by nature. A country where the rich, fertile soil has given birth to an exceptional wildlife.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Xander has a close-up encounter with a cobra, and travels north to Tamil country where he helps dig up mines remaining after the bitter civil war that raged for 30 years.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: This eye-opening series follows the drama and hardships experienced by four Alaskan households in different corners of this merciless territory as they battle to make it through a long, dark, freezing winter. The huge US state of Alaska boasts some of the worlds most deadly weather, with temperatures regularly plummeting to a lethal -80 Fahrenheit, freezing exposed limbs in minutes. Yet it is also home to some of the toughest, most resilient, most isolated people in the world. Life is all about survival in the face of unrelenting weather, scarce resources and man-eating carnivores.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets people who have turned their backs on Western society and set up home in some of the most isolated locations on Earth. Ben meets Niall, who rescues and cares for street dogs in Koh Samui.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Europes most active volcano, is experiencing its longest spate of eruptions in recent years. Our story starts almost a year earlier, long before the eruptions reach full force. Etna fires off intermittently and, on the summit, a new volcanic crater grows.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: History gets personal as historian David Olusoga uncovers how British imperial history is family history.

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben visits the Caribbean island of Montserrat, where a volcano devasted large areas in the 1990s. Within two years most of the population had fled their homes. Ben uncovers unique stories of heroism and loss.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Yorkshire-born Moli and his Californian wife Noelle in Tanzania, who run a safari business and live nomadically in a remote African wilderness.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: Historian David Olusoga uncovers how the British Empire lives on across the world.

programme.title: Panorama: Can Climate Scientists Save the World?
programme.desc: Panorama meets some of the brightest minds in climate science advocating more drastic action to halt climate catastrophe - including controlling the power of the weather.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series. 2/2

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes in Georgia and Azerbaijan as he journeys through the former Russian empire. He begins in the port of Batumi, discovers a surprise 19th-century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside, visits a private museum dedicated to Joseph Stalin - the most infamous Georgian of all - and discovers that a Briton was the first to conquer the highest mountain in the Caucasus range. Arriving in Azerbaijan, he learns about its role in the 19th-century oil industry.

programme.title: Abban Agnetha
programme.desc: Agnetha Faltskog on popkulttuurin tunnetuimpia hahmoja. Ohjelmassa tutustutaan hanen musiikilliseen uraansa seka elamaan estradien ulkopuolella.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Koomikko Ellie Taylor lahtee Richard Ayoaden mukaan kahden paivan mutkittelulle ympari Madridia seuraten paljon taidetta, kinkkua, historiaa ja huomionkipeytta sisaltavaa matkasuunnitelmaa. Kinkku puuttuu harvoin ruokalistalta Espanjassa, ja Richard ja Ellie osallistuvat kinkunvuolemistyopajaan, jota seuraa viiden ruokalajin maistelumenyy. Toisena paivana Madridissa he tsekkaavat kaupungin laajimman puiston ja istuvat ankkakirkkoon, jossa klovni ja entinen sirkustaiteilija Leo Bassi pitaa palveluksen sunnuntaina. Virkistavan vermuttijuomauhrin jalkeen he tekevat kierroksen kaupungilla kuullakseen tarinan Espanjan inkvisitiosta ennen kuin arvioivat Madridin ansioita.

programme.title: Pointless

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Kausi 7, 9/10. Kilpailu on edennyt semifinaaleihin. Nelja jaljella olevaa ompelijaa tekee talla viikolla vaatteita 1940-luvulta. Kaavahaastessa ommellaan miesten Oxford-housut. Muodonmuutostehtavassa palataan sota-aikaan, kun vanhoista laskuvarjoista muokataan upeita mekkoja. Loppuhaasteen inspiraationa toimii Diorin 40-luvun New Look-siluetti.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Kausi 10, 7/10. Seitsemannella viikolla tutustutaan juhlaleivonnaisiin ympari maailmaa. Bravuurihaasteessa valmistetaan juhlavia pullia, teknisessa haasteessa sisilialaisia cassatella-leivonnaisia ja suurhaasteessa perinteinen malesialainen kek lapis Sarawak -kerroskakku. Leipomuksissa on mukana myos pohjoismaalaisia makuja. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: A size-changing Shard makes Xinyan HUGE and L.J. tiny. The big ape terrorizes Ban Tang to scare humans out of HIS habitat! But Mini-Jade Armors powers are downsized. To measure up, Jade will need more than a little help from her friends.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a friends tree mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with laser party favors and are propelled onto an unknown planet: a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the babys parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing beach party inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The young detectives get involved in a high-tech mystery while at a large technology company when a highly-advanced artificial intelligence robot goes rogue and takes control of the building that is heavily run by computerized gadgetry.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball, but the Kitty Kitty is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxationand off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. Its chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun tearing down their Kapla block buildings, which they rebuild just as fast. Grizzy finds that the she-bear hes in love with is impressed by the construction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on into two.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that hes a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his temple, Grizzy is transformed into an exceptionally intelligent being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. With his way above average IQ, not only will he be able to provide himself with the latest high-tech comfort, getting rid of the Lemmings should be a piece of cake.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spikes bones are missing, and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalots lucky high top sneakers.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Spike get glued together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of caring for the Duchess French Poodle and needs Tuffy and Jerrys help in keeping the ill-tempered mutt under control.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things get crazy down on the farm when a cat and mouse pursuit leads Jerry to hide his turtle egg in a hens nest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes to the beach to get a tan, but when the countryman arrives and prevents him from exposing to the sun, he is trying to find another place. And when the nimbus cloud covers the sun, he starts to desperately chase the beam of sunlight across London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Frustrated by the Batwheels distracting affinity for holiday festivities, Batwing decides to go solo to thwart Mr. Freezes evil Christmas-time plots. However, Batwing and the Batwheels soon realize that stopping Mr. Freeze is much harder when they all arent working together as a team.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the rest of the Batwheels are incapacitated and Gothams beloved holiday mascot, Ike Cicle, is captured by Mr. Freeze, Batwing realizes that going solo isnt all its cracked up to be. Now its up to her to rescue her friends, and work with them to save Christmas in Gotham.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about finding solutions that work for all.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark. / The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters.

Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A milkman accidentally walks off with a maritime curio belonging to Bean _ who indignantly follows him to the bottling plant at the local dairy, determined to retrieve it.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks installed a state-of-the-art home automation system.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Problems result after Tom and Jerry use too much of a witches disappearance potion.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
